builtinMetrics.name: answer_correctness
builtinMetrics.description: Evaluates the factual consistency between the generated answer and the expected answer, evaluating whether it is accurate and error-free.

builtinMetrics.name: answer_similarity
builtinMetrics.description: Evaluates the semantic alignment between the generated answer and the expected answer, determining whether they convey the same core information.

builtinMetrics.name: answer_relevancy
builtinMetrics.description: Evaluates how well the generated answer aligns with the question, judging whether the response directly addresses the query.

builtinMetrics.name: context_precision
builtinMetrics.description: Evaluates whether high-value information is prioritized in the retrieved content, reflecting the quality of ranking and information density.

builtinMetrics.name: context_recall
builtinMetrics.description: Evaluates whether the retrieval system successfully retrieves all key information necessary for formulating the answer, assessing the completeness of retrieval.

builtinMetrics.name: faithfulness
builtinMetrics.description: Evaluates whether the generated answer remains faithful to the provided context, determining whether it contains fabricated or inaccurate content.
